CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(RTL_Product_Group_3__c) = "Loan" && (BEGINS(UPPER(TEXT(RTL_Sub_Group_3__c)), "SECURED") || BEGINS(UPPER(TEXT(RTL_Sub_Group_3__c)), "HOME"))), "Secured Loan", IF((TEXT(RTL_Product_Group_3__c) = "Loan" && (BEGINS(UPPER(TEXT(RTL_Sub_Group_3__c)), "SECURED") = FALSE || BEGINS(UPPER(TEXT(RTL_Sub_Group_3__c)), "HOME") = FALSE)), "Unsecured Loan", TEXT(RTL_Product_Group_3__c)) )
CustomField.label: CXM Product Group 3
